QueryResult.text: select 'x' pmd_analytical_partition_by, cbk_gl_allocation.id odf_pk, cbk_gl_allocation.prchargecode_id as prchargecode_id, cbk_gl_allocation.prtypecode_id as prtypecode_id, cbk_gl_allocation.status_code as status_code, cbk_gl_allocation.cost_type as cost_type, odf_ca_resourcecredit.odf_period_end as odf_period_end, odf_ca_resourcecredit.odf_period_type as odf_period_type, cbk_gl_allocation.chg_rem_to_overhead as chg_rem_to_overhead, cbk_gl_allocation.table_name as table_name, cbk_gl_allocation.location_id as location_id, odf_ca_resourcecredit.odf_period_start as odf_period_start, updated.FULL_NAME as last_updated_by, ( SELECT CASE CMN_PAGES.PRINCIPAL_TYPE WHEN 'SYSTEM' THEN CMN_PAGES.ID ELSE NVL(CMN_PAGES.ORIGINATING_PAGE_ID,CMN_PAGES.ID) END FROM CMN_INSTANCE_PAGES, CMN_PAGES WHERE CMN_INSTANCE_PAGES.PAGE_FRAME_ID = CMN_PAGES.ID AND CMN_INSTANCE_PAGES.OBJECT_INSTANCE_ID = CBK_GL_ALLOCATION.ID AND CMN_INSTANCE_PAGES.OBJECT_TYPE = 'CBK_RESOURCECREDIT_TABS' ) as page_layout, odf_ca_resourcecredit.obj_description as obj_description, cbk_gl_allocation.chargeback_type as chargeback_type, cbk_gl_allocation.utility_code_2 as utility_code_2, CBK_GL_ALLOCATION.last_updated_date as last_updated_date, cbk_gl_allocation.utility_code_1 as utility_code_1, cbk_gl_allocation.allocation_code as resource_credit_code, cbk_gl_allocation.department_id as department_id, cbk_gl_allocation.investment_id as investment_id, cbk_gl_allocation.chargeback_subtype as chargeback_subtype, cbk_gl_allocation.entity_id as entity_id, cbk_gl_allocation.resource_class_id as resource_class_id, created.FULL_NAME as created_by, cbk_gl_allocation.transclass as transclass, CBK_GL_ALLOCATION.created_date as created_date, odf_ca_resourcecredit.partition_code as partition_code, odf_ca_resourcecredit.odf_entity_code as odf_entity_code from cbk_gl_allocation cbk_gl_allocation JOIN odf_ca_resourcecredit odf_ca_resourcecredit ON odf_ca_resourcecredit.id=cbk_gl_allocation.id , SRM_RESOURCES created, SRM_RESOURCES updated where CBK_GL_ALLOCATION.CREATED_BY = created.USER_ID AND CBK_GL_ALLOCATION.LAST_UPDATED_BY = updated.USER_ID
